	- Links such as the github repo, hdwallpaper ect are all wrong or simply outdated!!!!
##########################################################################################

2) sudo apt-get install git live-build cdebootstrap devscripts

3) git clone git://git.kail.org/live-build-config.git
			 https://gitlab.com/kalilinux/build-scripts/live-build-config.git
4) cd live-build-kali

5) vim config/package-lists/kali.list.chroot
	a) choose package top 10 _uncomment_
	b) change desktop from KDE _comment_
	c) change desktop to xfce4 _uncomment_
	d) add custom packages
		#CUSTOM PACKAGES
			- openssh-server
			- openssh-client
			- vim
			- ranger
			- dialog
			- yad
			- ...

6) add custom boot option to allow automatic installation of the ISO
   by using a preconfigured preseed file.
   	a) cat <<EOF > config/includes.binary/isolinux/install.cfg
		> label install
		> manu label ^Install Automated
		> linux /install/intrid.gz
		> append vga=788 -- quite file=/cdrom/install/preseed.cfg locale=en_US keymap=us hostmane=think domain=think.local
		> EOF

7) add a post installation "hook" to enable SSH boot at startup
	a) echo update-rc.d -f ssh enable > config/hooks/01-start-ssh.chroot
	b) chmod +x config/hooks/01-start-ssh.chroot

8) overlay fils on the ISO filsystem. Replace default Kali wallpaper
	a) mkdir -p config/includes.chroot/usr/share/wallpapers/kali/contents/images
	b) wget "shifty image link"
	c) mv "shifty_image.jpg" config/includes.chroot/usr/share/wallpapers/kali/contents/images

9) Download a preseedfile from kali github and alter its content
	a) mkdir -p config/debian-installer
	b) wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/offencive-security/kali-ux-preseed/master/kali-linux-full-unattended.preseed -0 config/debian-install/preseed.cfg
	c) less config/debian-installer/preseed.cfg
10) Add Debian packages for inclussion
	a) mkdir config/packages
	b) mv /root/"Nessus-6.2.deb config/packages/
11) lb-build
